title: Friday Night 40K
description: Open play and league games. All experience levels welcome. Tables provided, bring your army!

title: Friday Night 40K
description: Open play and league games. All experience levels welcome. Tables provided, bring your army!

title: AoS Sunday Casual
description: Casual matched play. Bring 1000pts. Terrain and mats provided. Pizza for everyone!

title: AoS Monthly Tournament
description: 2000pt matched play tournament. 5 rounds Swiss. Prizes for top 3. Pre-registration required.

title: 40K Tournament Qualifier
description: ITC format, 2000pts. Top 2 players advance to regional qualifier. Sign up required.

title: Horus Heresy League Night
description: 30K league continues. Round 2 of the Isstvan campaign. Narrative play, bring 2500pts.

title: Horus Heresy League Night
description: 30K league continues. Round 3 of the Isstvan campaign.

title: Bolt Action Campaign Night
description: Ongoing WW2 campaign. Round 4 — Battle of the Bulge scenario. New players can join at any point.

title: Bolt Action Campaign Night
description: Ongoing WW2 campaign. Round 5 — Market Garden scenario.

title: KoW League Round 3
description: Round 3 of our spring Kings of War league. 1500pts Clash of Kings format. Bring painted armies!

title: KoW Beginner Workshop
description: New to Kings of War? Learn the rules with demo games. Loaner armies available. Free to attend!
